hints.content:
We can start with the $\green{\text{mice caught}}$ and add that to the $\pink{\text{mice left}}$, to find out how many $\purple{\text{mice were at the start}}$.

$\green{36} + \pink{22} = \purple{\Box}$
There were $\purple{58}$ mice at the start.

question.content:
The farmer has a problem with too many mice in  his barn.  He brought in $36$ cats to catch the mice.  Each cat caught $1$ mouse, but there were still $22$ mice left in the barn.  

**How many mice were in the barn at the start?**  

[[☃ input-number 1]] mice

![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/df39b7bc39131e7d31b37972baca7697.png)
